item.title: 100 errors ftl
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

can’t find anything in that error log just download EditPad Pro or any other notepad application that supports jagex bracket finding… it automatically finds the missing bracket in a method

Read full topic
